EBK18.original: Anyway, I jumped ship and I'm around. I'm just down in Florida, but I'm back soon. Hopefully bump into you. I might get job selling fake handbags in Suffolk. There's a lot of money to be made there. It's crazy!
EBK18.translated: 总之，我下船了，留在了美国。我现在在佛罗里达，不过很快就回来了。说不定咱俩到时候能碰上。我可能会去Suffolk卖高仿手提包，这样肯定能大赚一笔。真是太疯狂了！

EBK18.original: Good seeing you, Niko! Try to stay out of trouble. You seemed kind of worn out. I hope things are not serious. I keep haring about the Eastern European crime wave and I hope you are not tangled up in this mess. Let me know if I can help.
EBK18.translated: 很高兴再见到你，Niko！尽量别被卷入麻烦，你看上去就很疲倦，希望情况没那么糟。我一直听说城里有东欧系的犯罪浪潮，希望那些事跟你无关。需要我帮忙就说一声。

EBK18.original: How you doing? Did you decide to stay in Liberty City? How's your cousin? I stayed. I heard everyone did. Did you hear about poor Captain. Poor man. He turned up dead and drunk in the river. And everyone else jumped ship? I wonder what those Chinese guys did with that heroin they were supposedly smuggling?
EBK18.translated: 你最近好吗？有没有留在自由城？你堂哥怎么样？我留下来了，听说船上的人都留下来了。那个船长真是可怜啊，太可怜了，他喝醉酒掉河里淹死了。船上的其他人好像都跳船了？不知道那些中国人最后是怎么处理走私来的海洛因的。

EBK18.original: Yeah, I'm tangled up in it and I don't think there's a way to get out. We'll see. Look after yourself. - N
EBK18.translated: 是的，我深陷泥潭，可能已经无法摆脱了。走一步看一步吧。你也保重。 - N

EBK18.original: Nice to hear from you, Hossan. I stayed. Let me know when you are back in town.
EBK18.translated: 很高兴收到你的信，Hossan。我留下来了。回自由城了记得告诉我。

EBK18.original: Thank you, Hossan. Things are not great. Trouble has followed me here from Europe and life has become cheap. I do not wish to involve you in this mess. Take care, Niko.
EBK18.translated: 谢谢你，Hossan。情况不是很好，麻烦也跟着我从欧洲一路横跨大西洋，生活也变得艰难了。我不想把你也卷进来。保重，Niko。

EBK18.original: I'm still here Hossan, but I found out my cousin's stories were just stories. Getting by ain't easy. - N
EBK18.translated: 我还在自由城，Hossan，但我发现我堂兄说的那些话都是编的。万事不易啊。 - N
